attributes.action: Make Peterlee Urgent Care Centre a 24 hour Walk In Facility.
attributes.background: There have been proposals to change the way the urgent care centre works, wanting to close it from midnight to 8am and provide a call out service in its place. However this is just further cuts to our area, we feel as though the people of Peterlee and surrounding areas deserve Better

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of Durham Dales, Easington and Sedgefield clinical commissioning group.

You can find out how to contact the CCG here:

https://www.durhamdaleseasingtonsedgefieldccg.nhs.uk/contact-us/
